Reviews.Title: Good QWERTY Keyboard Andoid
Reviews.Author: Steve V
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone because it is unlocked and I need a phone for use in Central America. The phone performs well enough but is a bit slow. Runs great on T-Mobile and you can get a no contract unlimited text and data (100 min talk time) for $30/month at Wal-Mart.You can't load it with a lot of apps because of the limited memory. Pick the apps you need the most! This is a good choice for a Blackberry replacement business phone with Android. Keyboard is a little cramped, but I got used to it in a couple of days.

Reviews.Title: Spice is Nice
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: This phone is really nice to look at the features are easy to use and overall I am happy with the product. Don't really have a down side other than finding a proper case and or cover for it having a hard time locating these items.

Reviews.Title: Touch Screen Out
Reviews.Author: Keykey
Reviews.Content: I only had this phone for 5 months and the touch screen went out me and I cant use the phone any more. Don't waste your money on this product.

Reviews.Title: Poor phone
Reviews.Author: jboadas
Reviews.Content: This phone its slow to start, have no memory at all and only can load a frew programs, It take about a month to come to Venezuela and the GSM service of movilnet its very deficient.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Made in China knock off. Imitation not original
Reviews.Author: ForexTech
Reviews.Content: If you have ever bought one of the made in China phones, then this is exactly what you will get, at least the one sold by Amazon fufilment. It is a knock off, I know from ample experience with the knock off cell phones from China. The screen looks and feels cheap, the objects and picture are not sharp, looks like the phone software was copied from somewhere. And I am sure the hardware is a knock off so it will last maybe 1 month before all kinds of breakdown. Not sure if there is an original or if it is the way this phone is from Motorola,  but certainly what I got was a "copy"...a bad looking copy.

Reviews.Title: Good phone for 99$ bucks
Reviews.Author: D.M.
Reviews.Content: i just bought this movil phone and i think is a good phone for people who is entering in the android ambient, besides of the cheap price that i pay wich was the number one reason that i bought this is also the fact that this phone comes with android version 2.3, thats right, not with the oldest 2.1 - update 1, the procesor is quite fast and is powered with an adreno 200 so you can run some good games but don't expect to run shadowgun or some other recent games because it can't, besides of that is a good phone as i said up to entry in the android world.

Reviews.Title: The phone died after 4 months Only
Reviews.Author: cecilia
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and used Only 4 months, and the phone won't turn on??? It's died??  It's so expensive paying $139 using 4 months. I am not sure if it is a copy one or original one. Can anyone help? Is there a warranty from the manufacture? I am very disappointed. :(I bought from UNLOCKED CELL PHONE KINGS INC. so I just want everyone becareful and make sure where you buy your products.

Reviews.Title: CRAP Phone
Reviews.Author: Seth J. Singer
Reviews.Content: It broke within the first 2 weeks of having it - do yourself a favor and DO NOT BUY IT!

Reviews.Title: Not the right phone for  me
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Scott
Reviews.Content: I suppose the phone is a good phone, however it did not work for me. The reception was bad while it has ample bars, it just didn't work. It dropped calls (what i could hear) so i sent it back.

Reviews.Title: It is horrible
Reviews.Author: Maria Angelica Garcia Acosta
Reviews.Content: The keys do not work. If you press A, you see in the screen Q, if you press W, you see Z. They say that this cellphone is new but it is used.

Reviews.Title: Dissatisfied
Reviews.Author: Carl
Reviews.Content: I must say my expectations may have been too high,the phone has a fault with 2 of the buttons,the screen freezes and turns white.those are the issues I have with it so far,if in wasn't out of the country now I would have returned it for sure

Reviews.Title: faulty keys
Reviews.Author: Edgar Gomez
Reviews.Content: when I press the "Q" appears "A" and vice versawhen you press the "Y" aparace the "W" and vice versa.should not sell these products

Reviews.Title: NO BACK COVER!!!
Reviews.Author: Uriel Davila
Reviews.Content: I bought this item, excited about opening it and start using it since i lost my iPhone 5... when i opened it, it didnt have the back cover, i mean, who does that!!!!??? why would i want a phone without a back cover... not buying this item again, i dont want an exchange, just my money back!!!

Reviews.Title: Too slow / restarts by itself
Reviews.Author: Luichi
Reviews.Content: I was pretty excited when I got the phone. Since before buying, I like to research a product well. All reviews and stuff seemed OK for the phone so I bought it. The thing is that the phone isn't as fast as I thought it would be, and its internal memory just blows...mine's got merely 150 MB of internal storage, so it's an awful phone if you're into downloading lots of android apps.Another mayor flaw (at least for me) is that the phone resets every once in a while all by itself when not in use as well as when I was talking with it. The worst part was restarting...it takes the phone pretty looooong to completely load all contacts and stuff and since it restarted by itself in the middle of a conversation, you have to redial the person and wait every command for a while for the phone to react since it's loading.This phone is too slow for me and what completely ruins this phone is the miserable 150 MB of internal memory.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Glicelda Ramos
Reviews.Content: I got what I expected and more, It has very nice features. The packaging was just perfect and it arrive at the right time!!!!

Reviews.Title: liked the item
Reviews.Author: L. Hield
Reviews.Content: like moto phones, owned couple, it is fun to play with, love the android os and the touchscreen and keyboard

Reviews.Title: Smart phone
Reviews.Author: Reggie/mixerjockey
Reviews.Content: best little phone my wife loves it keys could of been a little larger. likes the rest of the features. if shes happy I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money and time.
Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: Just like everyone else. Phone screen turns white and shuts off by itself. Turns off in the middle of calls. Freezes constantly, started as soon as I recieved it. NO MEMORY at all. The phone constantly will freeze because of no memory. All I have is a weather app and pictures...I have to constantly delete pictures, call lists, etc, just to make a call....ridiculous. I am so not a picky girl with phones...but when my phone stops functioning due to memory and I am trying to make a call?? Huge waste of money unless you want a phone that hangs up on everyone, has not enough memory for even pictures, and will shut off constantly on its own.

Reviews.Title: Funciones " touch "
Reviews.Author: VBF
Reviews.Content: Compre el producto en julio y las funciones touch no estan funcionando bien. Se traban y debo prender y apagar el telefono o poner y sacar baterias.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Moto Switch UI; allows users to switch from different modes
Access to Google Maps Navigation and Google Talk and thousands of apps
MicroSD Memory Card Slot up to 32GB; QWERTY Keyboard, 3MP Camera; FM Radio with RDS support
Dual-band HSDPA / Quad-band EDGE
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola Spice XT316 Unlocked GSM Phone with Android 2.3, QWERTY Keyboard, 3MP Camera, microSD Card Slot and Wi-Fi
